member.name: T:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter
member.summary: This class is the main of the DLL. It consists of the methodes and fields used in LabView.
member.remarks: How to use DLL in LabView see: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hE0TVHqZjBI ------------ To view this doc see https://github.com/EWSoftware/SHFB or https://www.helixoft.com/vsdocman/overview.html

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.TomoKISStudioIP
member.value: The IP address of TomoKISStudio module.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.TomoKISStudioPort
member.value: The TCP port number the TomoKISStudio module is listening on.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.ConsiderNormalizedData
member.value: If true the normalized data are considered otherwise the RAW data retreived directly from Rocsole device.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.CurrentRocsoleFrameIndex
member.value: Gets the index of the current measurement frame.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.CurrentRocsoleFrameTimeStamp
member.value: Gets the time stamp of the current measurement frame.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.FactorA
member.value: Sets the factor A of the transformation equation.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.FactorB
member.value: Sets the factor B of the transformation equation.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.FactorC
member.value: Sets the factor C of the transformation equation.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.ElectrodesCount
member.value: Sets the electrodes count of the sensor.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.UDPIP
member.value: The IP address of LabView module.

member.name: P:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.UDPPort
member.value: The UDP port number the LabViewmodule is listening on.

member.name: M:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.Connect2TomoKISStudio(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the TomoKISStudio module on IP and port .
member.returns: True if success. See the console windows to check reasons
member.param: TCP port number the TomoKISStudio module is listening on.

member.name: M:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.CloseTomoKISStudioConnection
member.summary: Disconnects from the TomoKISStudio module and closes the internal receiving thred/>.
member.returns: True if success. See the console windows to check reasons

member.name: M:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.ProcessNextFrame
member.summary:
Starts processing:
Connection Connects the TomoKISStudio module if not connected yet.
New measurement frame Retreives a new measurement frame.
Filtering Filters the opposite electrodes.
Averaging Calculate average of measurements values of the opposite electrodes to get a single current value (X).
Calculation Makes calculation Y = factorA * X + factorB.
UDP sending Sends the (Y) value on UDP to LabView module.
member.returns:
Y value. If error returns -1.
Connection Not connected to TomoKISStudio or connection fails.
Measurement data format Wrong measurement data format.
See the console windows to check reasons

member.name: M:RocsoleDataConverter.Converter.SendValue(System.Double,System.String)
member.summary: Sends calucated double-type to the LabView module with the Default precision is 0.##
member.returns: True if success otherwise false. See the console windows to check reasons

example.code: SendValue(10.12345, "0.###") will send 10.123 SendValue(10.12345) will send 10.12
